resources.string: Uzodinga ukulandela ezinye izinyathelo ezibalulekile ukuze lesi sibuyekezo sikwazi ukufaka ngempumelelo, sicela ufunde futhi uqaphele lezi zinyathelo ezilandelayo.
Cindezela bese ubamba kokubili okhiye be- “Volume Up” kanye ne- “Power” ngasikhathi sinye…
Qhubeka ucindezela okhiye bobabili imizuzwana emi-3 bese ukhipha ukhiye we- “Volume Up” kuphela.
Uma usubona izinketho zemenyu, dedela inkinobho ethi “Amandla”.
Sebenzisa ukhiye we- “Volume Up / Down” ukugqamisa u- “Apply update from SD card”, bese ucindezela inkinobho ethi “Power”.
Ngemuva kokuthi ukubuyekeza kuphumelele, ezansi kwesikrini uzobona "Install from SD card completed with status 0".

Cindezela inkinobho ethi “Ivolumu Phezulu / Yehla” ukugqamisa “Reboot system now”. Kanye kugqanyisiwe, cindezela kafushane ukhiye we- “Power” (insizakusebenza manje qala kabusha ngokuzenzakalela). Sicela wazi: Idivayisi ingathatha imizuzu embalwa ukuqala kabusha.

string.name: prompt_text8
string.Data: Ngemuva kokuthi ifoni yakho iqale kabusha, uma ufisa, ungabheka inguqulo yeSoftware kusuka ku-Amasethingi> Mayelana nefoni> Inombolo yokwakha. Isibuyekezo esiphumelele sizoboniswa njenge- “"00WW_3_15K"”.

resources.string:
Lokhu kubuyekezwa kwesoftware kwenzelwe kuphela abasebenzisi beNokia 3.1 Plus enokwakhiwa kwesoftware: 

 00WW_3_15H 
 00WW_3_15H_SP01 

 Ukubheka ukwakhiwa kwedivayisi, iya kokuthi "Izilungiselelo"> "Mayelana nefoni"
Ngifundile futhi ngayiqonda imiyalo futhi ngikulungele ukuthola isibuyekezo seSoftware yeNokia 3.1 Plus Android 10.
Masenze amasheke wokugcina ukuqinisekisa ukuthi idivayisi yakho isilungile…
Okungenani isikhala samahhala esingu-600MB ekhadini le-SD.

string.name: import_desc_update
string.Data:
Lapho usuqale ukubuyekeza, lezi zinyathelo
ngeke ziboniswe kudivayisi yakho.

Sincoma wena noma:

Vula le isixhumanisi(www.nokia.com/phones/en_int/nokia-3-plus-OTA-support) kwikhompyutha yakho noma idivayisi yesibili (uma unayo) bese uphrinte noma ukopishe phansi imiyalo.

Idatha yakho yomsebenzisi ngeke ilahleke ngemuva kokuvuselelwa kwesoftware, kepha njengokuqapha, sincome abasebenzisi ukuthi benze emuva phezulu kwedatha yomsebenzisi ngaphambi kokufaka isibuyekezo

Uma KULUNGILE ukuqhubeka, cindezela okuthi Buyekeza

string.name: import_desc_next
string.Data:
Uma usuqale isibuyekezo, lezi zinyathelo ngeke ziboniswe kudivayisi yakho.

Sincoma wena noma:

Vula le isixhumanisi(www.nokia.com/phones/en_int/nokia-3-plus-OTA-support) kwikhompyutha yakho noma idivayisi yesibili (uma unayo) bese uphrinte noma ukopishe phansi imiyalo.

Idatha yakho yomsebenzisi ngeke ilahleke ngemuva kokuvuselelwa kwesoftware, kepha njengokuqapha, sincome abasebenzisi ukuthi benze emuva phezulu kwedatha yomsebenzisi ngaphambi kokufaka isibuyekezo.

Uma KULUNGILE ukuqhubeka, cindezela Okulandelayo
